snippet.title: Astebros - 16-bit Roguelite - Trailer 2022 [Sega Megadrive-Genesis/Nintendo Switch/Steam]
snippet.description:
To support us : https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/neofid-studios/astebros

Astebros is a new Sega Genesis/Megadrive Roguelite multiplayer game taking place in the Asteborg universe! It's also coming on Nintendo Switch and Steam !
Take control of three heroes and explore the new continent through randomly generated dungeons in a multitude of different environments!
Each new game will be different from the last, but you'll keep some of your precious finds!
Alone or in pairs, explore each area and collect valuable materials to upgrade your equipment the next time you visit the camp!
Our team created "Demons of Asteborg" for the Sega Genesis,  developing on this hardware is a real passion for us, that's why we decided to continue in this way, to make the Megadrive live again and again !
